title: Jupiter Transit in the 12th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Jupiterâ€™s transit through the twelfth house shifts focus inward for Leo ascendants, emphasizing closure, healing, and spiritual growth. External achievements take a back seat while inner clarity strengthens. Expenses may rise, often for meaningful reasons like education, travel, charity, or health. This phase favors letting go of outdated patterns and cultivating compassion. Progress is subtle but lasting, preparing you for a wiser new cycle ahead.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Growth through release rather than assertion

sections.heading: Career
points: Less focus on visibility, more on preparation
Good for research, retreat, or overseas roles

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Need for emotional space and understanding

sections.heading: Mental / Inner
points: Strong pull toward spirituality or solitude
Preparation for a new personal cycle

closing: This transit completes a cycle of growth. By releasing the past with wisdom and compassion, you quietly prepare the foundation for renewed strength and clarity.
